EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Calendars
EmailTemplate.subject: It's time to order 2019 Calendars
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}.
Our 2018 Calendar catalogs are now available. You can use this convenient link Office Depot Calendars 2018, order item number 412086 online or let me know what you need and where to send them.
If I can be of any assistance just let me know.
Regards,
